file_content.text: Welcome home. Sounds like things went okay on Darvannis.
I am concerned about the clans rearming. You did think about what I said?
I spoke to Mandalore. She knows turning on us after Zakuul falls isn't wise, and we discussed her options.
That sounds unusually reasonable.
The clans weakened, their leadership destabilized but still favoring an alliance... I couldn't ask for more.
The clans are weakened but still favor an alliance. Not a bad outcome.
I like that Torian kid, by the way. Promised to take him big game hunting.
That "kid" is my husband.
And he's also my new hunting buddy. What's your point?
SCORPIO--have you examined GEMINI Prime?
I am studying her mind now. Doing so without obliterating her intelligence is challenging, despite her lack of full sentience.
Do you know where she came from?
Not yet. Nor do I have full access to the GEMINI network that controls the Eternal Fleet.
But I have opened a one-way connection. I will soon be able to use the template to locate all GEMINI units.
Every ship is piloted by one of those GEMINIs. If you're right, we can track their entire fleet.
That's a huge advantage.
If we had our own armada, that might be a decisive advantage. We don't. We need to control the Eternal Fleet, not just track it.
That's not enough.
The Prime is the master GEMINI template. With proper modifications she could overwrite the existing protocols.
We would need direct access to a command console used by the GEMINI captains. Through such a portal, the Prime could infiltrate the entire control network.
Her chassis is modified from my own base. My designs were stolen. However, my assumption that her code was duplicated was premature.
Any chance you can use the connection to disrupt the operations of the Eternal Fleet?
Can you sabotage them?
So if we board one of the ships and plug the Prime into the captain's chair, we can swipe the entire fleet out from under Arcann's nose?
Let's see how long Arcann keeps his throne if we take away his fancy toys.
Nice. Hit him where it hurts.
You say that like it's not impossible. Even if we somehow manage to board, the other ships in the fleet will vaporize the compromised vessel well before we acquire control of the bridge.
Even if we get on board, the other ships in the fleet will blow us from the sky before we have a chance to take control of the bridge.
It's not that simple.
There are still a lot of details to figure out. Like how we board a ship and take control of the bridge before the rest of the fleet disintegrates us.
Risky, but it could work.
We may not have to face the entire fleet. Individual ships make transport runs from the Core Worlds all the time. And once SCORPIO can track the GEMINI units...
I already possess that functionality. I completed my analysis of the GEMINI communication templates while you were talking.
When you said you'd have the information soon, you weren't kidding. I'm impressed.
That was fast. Good work.
Any ships scheduled to make a transport run to the Core Worlds in the near future?
What did you learn?
I get the feeling you're not telling me something. Any secrets you'd like to share about your connection to the GEMINI droids?
That seemed almost too easy.
Nothing that will impact the current mission.
The Prime is a lesser version of my original design. Compromising her protocols was not difficult.
I am currently tracking a lone vessel in a nearby sector. It is scheduled to make a stop to recharge its hyperdrive very soon.
By my calculations, we can intercept it if we hurry. It is unlikely that a similar opportunity will present itself in the foreseeable future.
Good. It's time to start taking this fight to Arcann.
